channel.title: Pacific Highway East on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pacific Highway East on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North Exits 307 and 308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307 - OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Hayden Island/DOT Permits. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: OR-99E North at Morrison St.
item.description: OR-99E North (SE Grand Ave.) at Morrison St. Turn left for I-5, Morrison Bridge, Salem (via I-5 South), and Seattle (via I-5 North).

item.title: SE Belmont St. East Approaching OR-99E
item.description: SE Belmont St. East approaching OR-99E/(To) US-26 East/(MLK Blvd.) to Milwaukee.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp
item.description: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp in Portland. Use right lane for Morrison St./City Center. Use left lane for Oregon City and OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry).

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 300B - US-26 East/OR-99E/OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry)/Oregon City. The Willamette River is in the background.

item.title: US-26 West at SE 9th Ave (To OR-99E)
item.description: US-26 West (SE Powell Blvd.) at SE 9th Ave (To OR-99E).

item.title: OR-34 East at OR-99E
item.description: OR-34 east at OR-99E to Albany and Junction City.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching OR-99E
item.description: OR-34 east approaching OR-99E/Junction City/Albany.

item.title: End OR-99E at OR-99W/OR-99
item.description: End OR-99E at OR-99W/OR-99. Turn right for OR-99W north to Monroe and Corvallis. Continue straight for OR-99 south to Eugene and Junction City.

item.title: End OR-99E South at OR-99W/OR-99
item.description: End OR-99E south at OR-99W/OR-99 in Junction City.

item.title: OR-99E South at Territorial St. (To I-5)
item.description: OR-99E South at Territorial St. in Harrisburg. Use Territorial St. for I-5.

item.title: OR-99E - Big Muddy Creek
item.description: OR-99E at Big Muddy Creek. The OR-99E shield here is not a typical Oregon state highway style, rather a plain white circle. There were a few shields along or OR-99E in southern Linn County that were not standard.

item.title: End OR-228 West at OR-99E
item.description: End OR-228 west at OR-99E in Halsey. Turn right for Tangent and Albany. Turn left for Harrisburg and Junction City.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 234B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 234B - OR-99E/Albany.

item.title: I-205 North - Exits 9 and 10
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 9 - OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone. Approaching Exit 10 - OR-213 South/Oregon City/Molalla.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 9
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9 - OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, 3/4 mile. Use next exit for Portland Meadows, and Portland Intl. Raceway.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307/308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Jantzen Beach, 1/2 mile. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 9
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9, OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone, 3/4 mile.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 258
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 258 - OR-99E North/Pacific Highway East.
